disclaimer: Neuroclima Bot can make mistakes. Always make sure to double-check important information in its answers.
fetchError: There was an issue fetching the data. Please try again.
pageNotFoundDescription: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
tippingPointsDescription: Social tipping points are critical thresholds where small changes in human behavior or social systems can lead to rapid, large-scale transformation in society's response to climate change.
graphViewExplanation: The graph view shows the relationship between concepts related to this social tipping point.
referencesExplanation: The references tab provides scientific literature and sources related to this social tipping point.
clickNodesInteraction: Click on nodes to see more details or access linked documents.

banner.title: Your Privacy Matters
banner.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience. Your data helps us enhance our AI model and provide better climate insights.
banner.anonymized: All data is anonymized and cannot be traced back to you

settings.title: Privacy Settings
settings.description: Manage your data collection preferences. You can change these settings at any time.
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your consent preferences? The page will reload.

essential.name: Essential Services
essential.description: Required for the application to function properly. Includes session management and core chat functionality.
essential.details: These services are always active and cannot be disabled.

analytics.name: Analytics & Research
analytics.description: Helps us improve the AI model and analyze user interactions for research purposes.
analytics.details: Includes: question logging, trace collection in Langfuse, performance monitoring, and model training data.

info.anonymizationDescription: All data collected through Neuroclima Bot is completely anonymized. We do not collect personal information, and your interactions cannot be linked back to you individually.
info.platformIndependenceDescription: Neuroclima Bot operates independently from the main Neuroclima Solutions platform. Even if you have an account on the main platform, all interactions on Neuroclima Bot remain anonymous.
info.dataItem1: Questions and queries you submit to the chatbot
info.usageItem1: Improving AI model accuracy and responses
info.yourRightsDescription: You can withdraw consent at any time through Privacy Settings in the header. Changes take effect immediately.
